allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name dashboard -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyagent -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyproxy -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ''Done''")

Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name polyproxy -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyagent -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name dashboard -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ''Done''")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-agent dashboard, paper trading simulation, and project infrastructure

- Add multi-agent dashboard with 10 strategy presets \(agent/src/bin/dashboard.rs\)
- Implement paper trading simulation with fees, slippage, and market impact modeling
- Add SimConfig for configurable simulation parameters
- Extend Trade struct with 8 simulation tracking fields
- Add database migration for simulation columns
- Add run.sh script for starting proxy and dashboard
- Add reset-db scripts for database management
- Add comprehensive project documentation \(SETUP.md\)
- Update .gitignore to exclude generated configs
- Add .env.example for configuration template
- Add workspace Cargo.toml for multi-crate project
- Update copyright and repository references

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(python -c " import smtplib from email.mime.text import MIMEText from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart # SMTP config smtp_host = ''smtp.hostinger.com'' smtp_port = 587 smtp_user = ''info@autobot.co.id'' smtp_pass = ''*Ganteng12'' # Email content msg = MIMEMultipart\(''alternative''\) msg[''From''] = smtp_user msg[''To''] = smtp_user # Send to self for testing msg[''Subject''] = ''TEST - Polymarket Agent Notification System'' html = ''''''

TEST EMAIL NOTIFICATION

Polymarket Agent System

Email Successfully Configured!

Your email notification system is ready to send:

  • Trade closed notifications
  • Daily performance summaries
  • Critical alerts

Status: All systems operational

Polymarket Trading Agent - Automated Notifications

'''''' msg.attach\(MIMEText\(html, ''html''\)\) # Send server = smtplib.SMTP\(smtp_host, smtp_port\) server.starttls\(\) server.login\(smtp_user, smtp_pass\) server.send_message\(msg\) server.quit\(\) print\(''[SUCCESS] Test email sent to:'', smtp_user\) ")
